Class AlienAddons

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.Component
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.AlienAddons
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AlienAddons extends Component
Represents a specific type of Component known as AlienAddons. This class defines behavior for a component that can be added, removed, cloned, rotated, and validated in context with a PlayerBoard. AlienAddons introduces unique functionality to modify or interact with the player's game state.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AlienAddons

      public AlienAddons()
      Constructs a new instance of the AlienAddons class. This constructor initializes an AlienAddons component, representing a specific game element that can be added to a player's board. AlienAddons contribute to gameplay with unique functionalities such as interaction with the player's state, rotation logic, and board manipulation.

  • Method Details

    • controlValidity

      public boolean controlValidity(PlayerBoard pb, int x, int y)
      Determines the validity of a specific action or position on the given PlayerBoard.
      Specified by:
      controlValidity in class Component
      Parameters:
      pb - the PlayerBoard instance to evaluate
      x - the x-coordinate to check on the board
      y - the y-coordinate to check on the board
      Returns:
      true if the position or action is valid, otherwise false

    • rotate

      public void rotate(Boolean direction)
      Rotates the component in the specified direction.
      Specified by:
      rotate in class Component
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to rotate the component. Pass true for clockwise rotation and false for counterclockwise rotation.

    • insert

      public void insert(PlayerBoard playerBoard, int x, int y)
      Inserts the current AlienAddons instance into the specified PlayerBoard at the specified coordinates. This method adds the AlienAddons instance to the player board's list of addons and sends updates to the game state.
      Specified by:
      insert in class Component
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the PlayerBoard where the AlienAddons instance is to be inserted
      x - the x-coordinate where the AlienAddons instance is to be positioned
      y - the y-coordinate where the AlienAddons instance is to be positioned

    • remove

      public void remove(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Removes this AlienAddons component from the specified PlayerBoard. This method updates the game state by removing the component from the player's collection of AlienAddons and sending a removal event.
      Specified by:
      remove in class Component
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the PlayerBoard instance from which this AlienAddons component will be removed

    • clone

      public Component clone(PlayerBoard clonedPlayerBoard)
      Creates and returns a copy of this AlienAddons object. The clone shares the same type as the original object but does not share any references to other objects, ensuring a distinct instance.
      Specified by:
      clone in class Component
      Parameters:
      clonedPlayerBoard - the PlayerBoard associated with the cloning process, though it is not used within this method.
      Returns:
      a new Component instance that is a copy of this AlienAddons object.
